data.name: No Man's Island
data.detailed_description:
Check out more games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1982080/Animal_Shelter__Puppies__Kittens_DLC/


Check out more games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1823840/Illusion_Lands/


Check out more games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1788540/No_mans_Island_Prologue/?curator_clanid=4777282&utm_source=SteamDB


About the Game


See also game
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1788540/No_mans_Island_Prologue/



No Man's Island is an uncompromising wilderness Survival game.
Enter a strange and unexplored world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style. Play your way as you unravel the mysteries of this strange land.

Key Features:

Uncompromising Survival & World Exploration:

No instructions. No help. No hand holding. Start with nothing and craft, hunt, research, farm and fight to survive.

Isometric game:

3D characters and odd creatures inhabiting a unique 3D world.



  • Player controls (mouse, keyboard)
  • Inventory system
  • Crafting system
  • Equipment (attached to character)
  • Resource gathering
  • Character attributes (health, hunger, thirst...)
  • Animals
  • Hunting and Fishing
  • Farming (Sowing seeds, and plant/fruit growth)
  • Eating and cooking
  • Basic material (wood, grass, rock, ...)
  • Gathering tools (axe, pickaxe, fishing rod, ...)
  • Weapons/armor
  • Food (berries, apples, nuts, meat, fish, ...)
  • Cooked food (fish & chips, skewer, bread...)
  • Constructions (fire, shelter, house...)
  • Environment (trees, bushes, rocks, floor patterns...)
  • Farming plants (corn, potatoes, wheat...)
  • Combat (against wild animals)
  • Item durability and food spoilage
  • Storage boxes (chest)
  • Pets (follow, attack and dig behaviors)
  • Bonus effects (Consumable or equipment that boost stats).
  • Temperature, cold and heat sources.
  • Game clock, day/night cycle
  • Save/Load system
  • 5 biomes, with different enemies



The island contains 5 biomes.

Pre-Alpha: 2 Biomes. Difficulty * / Difficulty **
Alpha: 3 Biomes. Difficulty ** / Difficulty ***
Beta: 5 Biomes. Difficulty *** / Difficulty **** / Difficulty *****

data.short_description: No Man's Island is an uncompromising wilderness survival game. Enter a strange and unexplored world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style. Play your way as you unravel the mysteries of this strange land.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows速 10
  • Processor: Intel速 Core i5-6600K/AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970/AMD Radeon HD 7900 Series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows速 10
  • Processor: Intel速 Core i5-9600k/AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060/AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
